name: Sealed Sorcery
description:
This is a local multiplayer game. Players can use their special attacks only once per round. Grab a friend and have fun!

Controls

Return - Confirm/Pause

Player 1 : 

WASD to move

F - Melee Attack

G - Special Attack

H - Jump

Player 2:

Arrow Keys to move

, - Melee Attack

. - Special Attack

/ - Jump

Controller support is implemented and recommended

Credits

Art- Pascone, Lunar Discord

Audio - InSuccession

Programming/UnityDevelopment - Tommy, RJ
